title: CFB Realignment With Andy Staples, Djokovic The GOAT, Zach Wilson May Have That Dog In Him Plus Mt Rushmore Of CFB Traditions
description:
Novak Djokovic is the one true GOAT and we talk a little tennis. (00:02:29-00:07:34) Baker gets traded to the Panthers and Zach Wilson may be banging his mom's best friend. (00:07:35-00:20:05) F1 talk even though we didnt watch the race. (00:20:06-00:22:00) Who's back of the week goes sideways into a hypothetical Lebron/Steph vs Magic/MJ debate and Brett Favre is open to being the Color Analyst on MNF. (00:23:30-00:45:27) Andy Staples joins the show to talk CFB realignment, whats going to happen to Notre Dame, and how the Big 12 may be in a great spot going forward. We finish with the Mt Rushmore of College Football Traditions.Â (00:46:27-01:44:50)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
